"Riftfang"

The Riftwatchers, come to places whre "the Rift", the eldritch dimension between worlds, has become thin. They specialize in quick movement to counter foes with uncomprehendable power and size. The watchers were once united as "The Grey Legion", reuniting them is rewarded by passive bonuses to other Watchers.

To fight the the edritch corruption, the watcher specialized on quick movement. The dagger is utilized as a wedge in the left hand while the greatsword is held in the right, a unique technique that was synonymous with the Undead Legion. Confounds foes the manner of wolves hunting prey.
The Legion of watchers was a caravan of wandering hunters. They needed to learn to survive in the corrupted wilds. Therefore they specialized in using their surroundings for their advantage.
Night of the Legion
The sound of marching feet breaks the silence of the night. The Legion of watcher arrived, seeking for signs of the eldritch corruption
Wolfblood Ritual
The watcher gather in this clear night. Preparing for their brotherhood ritual, reminiscent of the one they call "Riftwalker"
The Vanguard

Wild eyes glimpse under a pointy helmet. A Watcher of the "Grey Legion" wanders along the old road, seeking for any signs of malvolent corruption. He is the tip of the spear, the Grey Legion is on the way ...
Swordgrass
The Riftwatchers use this for their brotherhood ritual. These leaves are sharp like metal. Throw them to {colour_start|bleed}Bleed{colour_end} your foes.
Cattail Flute
The Watchers of the Legion learned to craft flutes out of wild Cattail-gras. The mild Melody {colour_start|virtue}clears Horror and heals Stress{colour_end}
